name: traggo
description: Traggo is a self-hosted time tracking system that lets users track work using tags and flexible time ranges. It emphasizes quick logging and visualizations in a lightweight web interface.
features: Tag-based tracking: Track time using flexible tags instead of rigid project hierarchies for natural organization.
Time ranges: Log time with start and end times or use a running timer for active work.
Quick logging: Start tracking with minimal clicks using a streamlined interface focused on speed.
Visualizations: View time spent across tags with charts and graphs showing distribution and trends.
Flexible tagging: Use multiple tags per time entry for multi-dimensional analysis and reporting.
Calendar view: See tracked time on a calendar to understand daily and weekly patterns.
Statistics: Generate statistics showing time spent by tag, day, week, or custom periods.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements for always-on time tracking.
Web interface: Access time tracking from any device through a responsive web interface.
Export data: Export time tracking data for invoicing, reporting, or analysis in other tools.
Privacy-focused: Keep all time tracking data on your own server with complete control.
Multi-user: Support multiple users with individual time tracking and separate data.
